scenario_text.value: This is bad. There’s nothing here.
Are we in the wrong place...?
Chill, we’re definitely in the right place...
Right, Takuma?
Yeah. I don’t think Renamon’s info was off.
And it’s not like we’ve got another lead...
We have to find it quickly, but...

(Those two are tired from the fruitless
search. Maybe we should take a quick break?)

(Or maybe I should get them to calm down and
go over the information we have?)
(What should I say to them?)
You two rest.
Let’s think it over.
This’ll work out.
You two rest.
You two take a rest. I’ll keep looking.

You know we can’t do that. We have to look
together, don’t we?
Yeah, but if you’re tired, you should rest.
Who said we’re tired?
...Well I am, a little.

Wait, really?! Then we’ve gotta rest for
sure...

You’re overreacting, Kaito. Just a little
break will do.

Still, I’m happy you thought of us, Takuma.
Thank you...

If you’re good on your own, then cool...but
call if you need anything, okay?
(That’s Kaito for you...)
Let’s think it over.
Let’s take a sec to think things over.

If we trust Renamon’s info, this has gotta be
the right place.
Right... No reason to think that guy’s lying.
Yeah, he’s telling the truth for sure.
Exactly, so let’s look around a bit more.
...Sure.
Why don’t you rest, Miu? The two’ve us will—
Don’t worry so much. I’m still just fine!
This’ll work out.
This’ll work out.
“Work out”... Ain’t that a bit vague?
You tired, Takuma?

No, that’s not it! Anyway, let’s keep up the
good work!
There you go, being vague again...
At any rate, we’ll check out somewhere else.
Let’s go, Miu.
I don’t have to go with you, you know...

(This might be a weird thing to say, but
those two sure are tight...)

Miu’s putting her all into the search. Man,
has she grown up...

Get serious about this, Kaito! Instead of
bothering Takuma, get your butt in gear!
